blogPost.excerpt: 🌈 Spline now adds 3D vector editing along with other great features like Post-Processing. This represents a paradigm shift for 2D design, and a step towards a 3D-first design tool.
blogPost.body: 🌈 Spline now adds 3D vector editing along with other great features like Post-Processing. This represents a paradigm shift for 2D design, and a step towards a 3D-first design tool.
blogPost.title: Spline Alpha - Vector design, now in 3D
blogPost.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: 🌈Spline现在增加了3D矢量编辑和其他伟大的功能，如后处理。这代表了2D设计的一个范式转变，也是向3D优先设计工具迈出的一步。
🌈Spline現在增加了3D矢量編輯和其他偉大的功能，如後處理。這代表了2D設計的一個範式轉變，也是向3D優先設計工具邁出的一步。

previous.excerpt: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.
previous.title: YesPlz - Personalized fashion recommendations for Shopify

localize.description: 🧠 为Shopify商店提供智能、个性化的产品推荐--由真实的客户洞察力驱动。💥 我们的人工智能算法是通过数百万个数据点进行训练，了解客户的需求，特别是时尚产品。
localize.tagline: 为Shopify提供个性化的时尚推荐

localize.description: 🧠 爲Shopify商店提供智能、個性化的產品推薦--由真實的客戶洞察力驅動。💥 我們的人工智能算法是通過數百萬個數據點進行訓練，瞭解客戶的需求，特別是時尚產品。
localize.tagline: 爲Shopify提供個性化的時尚推薦
